tools.name: echo
tools.description: Echo back the input message. Provides message length and uppercase/lowercase transformations.

tools.name: ping
tools.description: Health check and system information tool for the Lambda function. Returns response time, memory usage, and other metrics.

tools.name: kb-retrieve
tools.description: Retrieve relevant chunks from Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Base using semantic search. Returns document chunks most relevant to the specified query.

knowledgeBaseId.description: The ID of the Knowledge Base to search

numberOfResults.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 5)

tools.name: marp-slide
tools.description: Generate presentation HTML slides from a Marp-formatted Markdown file in S3 and save the output to S3. Slides are separated by '---' delimiter.

inputS3Key.description: Path to the input Markdown file (key within USER_STORAGE_BUCKET). Example: 'users/user-123/presentations/slide.md'

outputS3Key.description: Path for the output HTML file (if omitted, saves to the same directory with .html extension)

theme.description: Slide theme. default: simple, gaia: modern, uncover: minimal
